description: A special little lemon slice. Perfect for a treat.
name: Lemon Delicious Slice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tsp icing sugar (for dusting to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Base: Pre heat oven to 180c fan forced. Grease 16cmx 23cm slice pan line with baking paper allowing over hang on all sides for easy removal.

Place butter in microwable safe bowl. Microwave to melt on 50% power Set aside to cool. When cool stir in sugar and vanilla. Sift flours over butter mixture using a wooden spoon stir form a soft dough. Transfer to prepared pan press evenly bake for 15 to 20mins until golden Remove from oven allow to cool.

Lemon topping: Whisk eggs, lemon rind, flour and sugar until smooth. Add lemon juice whisk to combine. Pour over base. Bake for 15-20 mins or until just set. Cool completely in pan. Dust with icing sugar. Cut in pieces. Serve.
